verses.verse: Adam, <WH121> Sheth, <WH8352> Enosh, <WH583>
Kenan, <WH7018> Mahalaleel, <WH4111> Jered, <WH3382>
Henoch, <WH2585> Methuselah, <WH4968> Lamech, <WH3929>
Noah, <WH5146> Shem, <WH8035> Ham, <WH2526> and Japheth. <WH3315>
The sons <WH1121> of Japheth; <WH3315> Gomer, <WH1586> and Magog, <WH4031> and Madai, <WH4074> and Javan, <WH3120> and Tubal, <WH8422> and Meshech, <WH4902> and Tiras. <WH8493>
And the sons <WH1121> of Gomer; <WH1586> Ashchenaz, <WH813> and Riphath, <WH7384> and Togarmah. <WH8425>
And the sons <WH1121> of Javan; <WH3120> Elishah, <WH473> and Tarshish, <WH8659> Kittim, <WH3794> and Dodanim. <WH1721>
The sons <WH1121> of Ham; <WH2526> Cush, <WH3568> and Mizraim, <WH4714> Put, <WH6316> and Canaan. <WH3667>

And the sons <WH1121> of Cush; <WH3568> Seba, <WH5434> and Havilah, <WH2341> and Sabta, <WH5454> and Raamah, <WH7484> and Sabtecha. <WH5455> And the sons <WH1121> of Raamah; <WH7484> Sheba, <WH7614> and Dedan. <WH1719>
And Cush <WH3568> begat <WH3205> Nimrod: <WH5248> he began <WH2490> to be mighty <WH1368> on the earth. <WH776>
And Mizraim <WH4714> begat <WH3205> Ludim, <WH3866> and Anamim, <WH6047> and Lehabim, <WH3853> and Naphtuhim, <WH5320>
And Pathrusim, <WH6625> and Casluhim, <WH3695> (of whom <WH834> came <WH3318> the Philistines, <WH6430>) and Caphthorim. <WH3732>
And Canaan <WH3667> begat <WH3205> Zidon <WH6721> his firstborn, <WH1060> and Heth, <WH2845>
The Jebusite <WH2983> also, and the Amorite, <WH567> and the Girgashite, <WH1622>
And the Hivite, <WH2340> and the Arkite, <WH6208> and the Sinite, <WH5513>
And the Arvadite, <WH721> and the Zemarite, <WH6786> and the Hamathite. <WH2577>

The sons <WH1121> of Shem; <WH8035> Elam, <WH5867> and Asshur, <WH804> and Arphaxad, <WH775> and Lud, <WH3865> and Aram, <WH758> and Uz, <WH5780> and Hul, <WH2343> and Gether, <WH1666> and Meshech. <WH4902>
And Arphaxad <WH775> begat <WH3205> Shelah, <WH7974> and Shelah <WH7974> begat <WH3205> Eber. <WH5677>

And to Eber <WH5677> were born <WH3205> two <WH8147> sons: <WH1121> the name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> was Peleg; <WH6389> because <WH3588> in his days <WH3117> the earth <WH776> was divided: <WH6385> and his brother's <WH251> name <WH8034> was Joktan. <WH3355>
And Joktan <WH3355> begat <WH3205> Almodad, <WH486> and Sheleph, <WH8026> and Hazarmaveth, <WH2700> and Jerah, <WH3392>
Hadoram <WH1913> also, and Uzal, <WH187> and Diklah, <WH1853>
And Ebal, <WH5858> and Abimael, <WH39> and Sheba, <WH7614>
And Ophir, <WH211> and Havilah, <WH2341> and Jobab. <WH3103> All <WH3605> these <WH428> were the sons <WH1121> of Joktan. <WH3355>
Shem, <WH8035> Arphaxad, <WH775> Shelah, <WH7956>
Eber, <WH5677> Peleg, <WH6389> Reu, <WH7466>
Serug, <WH8286> Nahor, <WH5152> Terah, <WH8646>
Abram; <WH87> the same <WH1931> is Abraham. <WH85>
The sons <WH1121> of Abraham; <WH85> Isaac, <WH3327> and Ishmael. <WH3458>
These <WH428> are their generations: <WH8435> The firstborn <WH1060> of Ishmael, <WH3458> Nebaioth; <WH5032> then Kedar, <WH6938> and Adbeel, <WH110> and Mibsam, <WH4017>
Mishma, <WH4927> and Dumah, <WH1746> Massa, <WH4854> Hadad, <WH1908> and Tema, <WH8485>
Jetur, <WH3195> Naphish, <WH5305> and Kedemah. <WH6929> These <WH428> <WH1992> are the sons <WH1121> of Ishmael. <WH3458>

Now the sons <WH1121> of Keturah, <WH6989> Abraham's <WH85> concubine: <WH6370> she bore <WH3205> Zimran, <WH2175> and Jokshan, <WH3370> and Medan, <WH4091> and Midian, <WH4080> and Ishbak, <WH3435> and Shuah. <WH7744> And the sons <WH1121> of Jokshan; <WH3370> Sheba, <WH7614> and Dedan. <WH1719>

And the sons <WH1121> of Midian; <WH4080> Ephah, <WH5891> and Epher, <WH6081> and Henoch, <WH2585> and Abida, <WH28> and Eldaah. <WH420> All <WH3605> these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Keturah. <WH6989>
And Abraham <WH85> begat <WH3205> Isaac. <WH3327> The sons <WH1121> of Isaac; <WH3327> Esau <WH6215> and Israel. <WH3478>
The sons <WH1121> of Esau; <WH6215> Eliphaz, <WH464> Reuel, <WH7467> and Jeush, <WH3266> and Jaalam, <WH3281> and Korah. <WH7141>
The sons <WH1121> of Eliphaz; <WH464> Teman, <WH8487> and Omar, <WH201> Zephi, <WH6825> and Gatam, <WH1609> Kenaz, <WH7073> and Timna, <WH8555> and Amalek. <WH6002>
The sons <WH1121> of Reuel; <WH7467> Nahath, <WH5184> Zerah, <WH2226> Shammah, <WH8048> and Mizzah. <WH4199>
And the sons <WH1121> of Seir; <WH8165> Lotan, <WH3877> and Shobal, <WH7732> and Zibeon, <WH6649> and Anah, <WH6034> and Dishon, <WH1787> and Ezar, <WH687> and Dishan. <WH1789>
And the sons <WH1121> of Lotan; <WH3877> Hori, <WH2753> and Homam: <WH1950> and Timna <WH8555> was Lotan's <WH3877> sister. <WH269>

The sons <WH1121> of Shobal; <WH7732> Alian, <WH5935> and Manahath, <WH4506> and Ebal, <WH5858> Shephi, <WH8195> and Onam. <WH208> and the sons <WH1121> of Zibeon; <WH6649> Aiah, <WH345> and Anah. <WH6034>
The sons <WH1121> of Anah; <WH6034> Dishon. <WH1787> And the sons <WH1121> of Dishon; <WH1787> Amram, <WH2566> and Eshban, <WH790> and Ithran, <WH3506> and Cheran. <WH3763>
The sons <WH1121> of Ezer; <WH687> Bilhan, <WH1092> and Zavan, <WH2190> and Jakan. <WH3292> The sons <WH1121> of Dishan; <WH1789> Uz, <WH5780> and Aran. <WH765>

Now these <WH428> are the kings <WH4428> that reigned <WH4427> in the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123> before <WH6440> any king <WH4428> reigned <WH4427> over the children <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478> Bela <WH1106> the son <WH1121> of Beor: <WH1160> and the name <WH8034> of his city <WH5892> was Dinhabah. <WH1838>
And when Bela <WH1106> was dead, <WH4191> Jobab <WH3103> the son <WH1121> of Zerah <WH2226> of Bozrah <WH1224> reigned <WH4427> in his stead. <WH8478>
And when Jobab <WH3103> was dead, <WH4191> Husham <WH2367> of the land <WH776> of the Temanites <WH8489> reigned <WH4427> in his stead. <WH8478>

And when Husham <WH2367> was dead, <WH4191> Hadad <WH1908> the son <WH1121> of Bedad, <WH911> which smote <WH5221> Midian <WH4080> in the field <WH7704> of Moab, <WH4124> reigned <WH4427> in his stead: <WH8478> and the name <WH8034> of his city <WH5892> was Avith. <WH5762>
And when Hadad <WH1908> was dead, <WH4191> Samlah <WH8072> of Masrekah <WH4957> reigned <WH4427> in his stead. <WH8478>
And when Samlah <WH8072> was dead, <WH4191> Shaul <WH7586> of Rehoboth <WH7344> by the river <WH5104> reigned <WH4427> in his stead. <WH8478>
And when Shaul <WH7586> was dead, <WH4191> Baalhanan <WH1177> the son <WH1121> of Achbor <WH5907> reigned <WH4427> in his stead. <WH8478>

And when Baalhanan <WH1177> was dead, <WH4191> Hadad <WH1908> reigned <WH4427> in his stead: <WH8478> and the name <WH8034> of his city <WH5892> was Pai; <WH6464> and his wife's <WH802> name <WH8034> was Mehetabel, <WH4105> the daughter <WH1323> of Matred, <WH4308> the daughter <WH1323> of Mezahab. <WH4314>
Hadad <WH1908> died <WH4191> also. And the dukes <WH441> of Edom <WH123> were; duke <WH441> Timnah, <WH8555> duke <WH441> Aliah, <WH5933> duke <WH441> Jetheth, <WH3509>
Duke <WH441> Aholibamah, <WH173> duke <WH441> Elah, <WH425> duke <WH441> Pinon, <WH6373>
Duke <WH441> Kenaz, <WH7073> duke <WH441> Teman, <WH8487> duke <WH441> Mibzar, <WH4014>
Duke <WH441> Magdiel, <WH4025> duke <WH441> Iram. <WH5902> These <WH428> are the dukes of Edom. <WH123>
